title: Support experiences in cat format
body:
Trying to auto attack the enemy just once for the assist but killing them:
http://bestanimations.com/Animals/Mammals/Cats/catgif/funny-cat-gif-2.gif
Braum vs pretty much anything:
http://www.catgifpage.com/gifs/311.gif
When the enemy top, mid, and jungle are fed and missing:
http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-fYJrkNWec08/T9EYOmNGPNI/AAAAAAAAC04/UtdRRM8a3hc/s640/cat-fat-dancing-cat-gif.gif
Being underlevelled and poor:
https://media.giphy.com/media/XwnOjVqPIlXGM/giphy.gif
Trying to climb out of bronze:
http://media3.giphy.com/media/oL5LPpbJrGZxe/giphy.gif
Having cc but no damage:
http://www.catgifpage.com/gifs/255.gif
The MLG Pro ADC who just happens to have the terrible team and the worthless jungler who won't towerdive to gank:
http://www.cutecatgifs.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/12/Facepalm.gif
{{champion:432}}: {{item:3069}} {{item:3117}} {{item:3041}} {{item:3285}} {{item:3504}} {{item:2045}} 
http://meowgifs.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/03/segway-kitten.gif
Being surprised by this mythical creature called a compliment:
http://viralgifs.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/03/cats_lil_bub.gif?fb43fe
Being out warding when your ADC decides to all-in:
http://www.catgifpage.com/gifs/280.gif
Baiting the ADC accidentally into a trap:
http://66.media.tumblr.com/39686164722eebf5189203aed2fb4866/tumblr_o6vpefunLR1vu39apo1_400.gif
Slowly catching up in level:
http://moderncat.com/sites/default/files/images/uploads/MustHaveWater.gif
Poking a fed enemy:
https://66.media.tumblr.com/f1ef49134420d512fa8ec7a1703e9b01/tumblr_o5vv7oYVX01v33e53o1_500.gif
When your team flames you for feeding after setting up aces with your intiations:
http://www.catgifs.org/wp-content/uploads/2013/09/089_manycats_cat_gifs.gif
At first I wasn't a Taric main:
http://www.cutecatgifs.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/08/fab.gif
When the enemy team starts focusing you:
http://67.media.tumblr.com/5458c4fbda1c8416a922bd727c0d8a53/tumblr_o52smtfBmm1slwrsuo1_400.gif

replies.body: This was absolutely adorable and scarily accurate. x3
I know right?

I can't help but notice that you have both "support" and "cat" in the title of the post, yet it doesn't mention me anywhere

http://thewondrous.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/06/Cat-shaking-paw-in-slow-motion.gif
Sorry, I try not to mention the greats in order to avoid coattailing

It's fine. Had one of the gifs been about Leona, then I would have been mad, however.

Ain't no other praiser as feline as me

>Baiting the ADC accidentally into a trap

Yes, Vayne, "accidentally."
my friends and I make a game out of it when we don't have a 5th and get matched with some A-hole that starts raging 30sec into the game.
Up voted for cute deluge.

I was playing Nautilus support with a Vayne. I was landing all my hooks, and using Targon's to last hit the cannons. I leave for five seconds to ward a bush after their jungle banks mid lane, and when I turn my head back the Vayne is turret diving the Braum and Sivir. She dies. "This is why I hate off meta-supports".
off-meta?
Anything that isn't Soraka or Janna is off meta. That is, anything that can't forcibly feed the ADC health or fake health to prevent them from killing themselves is worthless.
i meant to say that why is the Vayne calling NAUTILUS off meta
I was answering from the Vayne's point of view :P

She was referring to the fact that I could not forcibly feed her my health and mana every four seconds so she would die less fast to the turret. Apparently hard ccing the enemy team, pulling the enemy ad carry to her face and keeping her there, and disabling the jungle was not enough for her.
yes nautilus isn't even close to off meta. he has a crazy amount of cc
Ah yes, the whisker version of my support life  :)
Third one down is me with current lag problems, "oh no a spike, whats going on is everyone safe ahhhhhh where am I:(" support and cats hehe this thread is gold.

Too close to the truth it hurts.
At least when I play ADC I don't leave warding to the support, because I have some wards too, and together, we can ward an awful lot

Cuteness overload.

MUST
RESIST.
I'm sorry, this is so true/adorable/kitteny. Thank you for making me laugh!
https://media0.giphy.com/media/aUynIHr7m1YOY/giphy.gif

Much honor to the suport 1v1.
Report all who dare intervene!
You missed the feeling when you royally fucked up but nobody wants to antagonize the support so no one says anything, but you can feel their irritation at your mistake all the same.
But that doesn't really ever happen...

I guess you could say that supports are the real PUSSY of the team.
Yeah I'm not sorry

I think you should be considering how many down votes you got...

I was #10!

Idk if it is because of the shitty easy pun or the fact that people think I would belittle supports.. I don't hate supports nor do I really think playing a certain role is enough for me to assume who you are as a person.  But hey I admire the defense supports get outside of game doe.  It really makes me feline great
Upvoted, and added to my bookmarks.
Thanks for the laugh, I like kitties and play support, so it was funny :)

"Stay by your adc" either means they weren't  paying attention or they're  jealous and will feed til they have me to themselves. Also when I always spend 800 gold every game for shitty ward item with terrible charges but asking them to spend 800 gold one game against Vlad, Darius and Soraka comp is insulting to them.

My most recent game was against a Soraka, they kept attacking the Jinx and dying and cussing. But everytime I asked them to please buy an executioners calling they said they needed the gold. 

So i traded my sightstone for an executioners calling :^]
Thank you. But shouldn't the train apply to braum and leo.
Leo wouldn't not just sit in front of the train. She would utterly destroy it by the power of the sun. Braum is much more relaxed.
True true
A cataract of cuteness sweeps me away.
You have done a great thing here today.

So cute. **

I love aa the enemy killing them as a Support. XD

They wait was worth it.
